<<<<<<< HEAD
The blacke devil or the apostate Together with the wolfe worrying the lambes. And the spiritual navigator, bound for the Holy Land. In three sermons. By Thomas Adams. Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.
[8], 78, [2]; [4], 34, [2]; [4], 58, [2] p.
Printed by William Iaggard, [London] : 1615.
"Lycanthropy, or the vvolfe vvorrying the lambes" and "The spirituall nauigator bound for the Holy Land" each has separatley dated title page, pagination and register. Initial leaf contains large signature-mark "A" with ornaments. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The blacke devil or the apostate Together with the wolfe worrying the lambes. And the spiritual navigator, bound for the Holy Land. In three sermons. By Thomas Adams. Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.
[8], 78, [2]; [4], 34, [2]; [4], 58, [2] p.
Printed by William Iaggard, [London] : 1615.
"Lycanthropy, or the vvolfe vvorrying the lambes" and "The spirituall nauigator bound for the Holy Land" each has separatley dated title page, pagination and register. Initial leaf contains large signature-mark "A" with ornaments. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
William Iaggard
